name: @n8d/ice
description: Contains all built chain an tool for hTWOo
author: Stefan Bauer

scripts.release:checklist:
bash -c 'echo "ðŸ“‹ Release Checklist:
âœ… Make sure you are on main branch
âœ… git pull
âœ… git status should be clean
âœ… npm test
âœ… Run: npm run release:alpha:ice-build OR npm run release:stable:ice-build -- patch"'
scripts.ci:release: npm run test && npm run release:check
scripts.ci:release:ice-build: npm run test:ice-build && npm run dry-run:ice-build
scripts.ci:release:ice-hotreloader: npm run test:ice-hotreloader && npm run dry-run:ice-hotreloader
scripts.release:alpha:ice-build: npm run ci:release:ice-build && nx release version --projects=ice-build --specifier=prerelease --preid=alpha && npm run version
scripts.release:alpha:ice-hotreloader: npm run ci:release:ice-hotreloader && nx release version --projects=ice-hotreloader --specifier=prerelease --preid=alpha && npm run version
scripts.release:stable:ice-build: npm run ci:release:ice-build && nx release version --projects=ice-build --specifier=$npm_config_releaseType && npm run version
scripts.release:stable:ice-hotreloader: npm run ci:release:ice-hotreloader && nx release version --projects=ice-hotreloader --specifier=$npm_config_releaseType && npm run version
